name: Bingo Blaze - Free Bingo Fun
description:
Playing Bingo is Fun and Easy with Bingo Blaze!

Play 12 Bingo Worlds and up to 4 Cards at a time. Play to win and feel the challenge to beat the clock. You can do it!

Switch between cards quickly and easily. Daubing is a cinch and soon enough you can call Bingo!

-Multiple card play
-Cool Sounds and Background Music
-Lots of levels
-Beautiful bingo worlds to unlock
-Addicting gameplay

Bingo Blaze is Free and Fun and You Won't Want to Put it Down. It's Bingo, just like you remember, BUT even better!
